content.p: Jeremy provides executive leadership to the Faculty and ensures strategic and operational outcomes are met. View Jeremy's profile For any queries or issues about your course your personal tutor should be your first point of contact. If you are unsure who your personal tutor is you can find their details on the NottinghamHub. Alternatively, contact Student Sevices by email, live-chat, phone or in person. To contact the PVC office email: AR-Arts-Admin@nottingham.ac.uk Report on an operational level to the Faculty PVC and play a key part in leading the development and successful implementation of specific projects and initiatives Lead and manage operations within the Schools along with a Faculty-wide remit. See the Arts Research Hub for more information on the support and advice provided by FARA. To lead the development and implementation of the digital learning strategy for the Faculty. To provide leadership and management to ensure successful delivery of the student experience elements of the Facultyâ€™s Strategic Plan. Each school has a team of ESE officers working to improve the student experience. Contact details are on their school sites. The M4C supports the personal and professional development of the next generation of arts and humanities doctoral researchers.
